shortdesc.ph: Sets the local voice equalization effect.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setLocalVoiceEqualization( Constants.AUDIO_EQUALIZATION_BAND_FREQUENCY bandFrequency, int bandGain);
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|RtcEngineProxy") int SetLocalVoiceEqualization(EAUDIO_EQUALIZATION_BAND_FREQUENCY bandFrequency, int bandGain);
public abstract int SetLocalVoiceEqualization(AUDIO_EQUALIZATION_BAND_FREQUENCY bandFrequency, int bandGain);

section.title: Details
section.note: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: The band frequency. The value ranges between 0 and 9; representing the respective 10-band center frequencies of the voice effects, including 31, 62, 125, 250, 500, 1k, 2k, 4k, 8k, and 16k Hz. See .

pt.props: android cpp unreal bp unity flutter rn electron cs

plentry.pd: The gain of each band in dB. The value ranges between -15 and 15. The default value is 0.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; and you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

li.props: native unreal bp electron unity rn cs

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
